Title: Adventure Time
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Hynden Walch
Plot: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other.
Awards: Won 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 17 wins & 43 nominations.
